# cookies

**Instance Property**

The cookie storage’s cookies.

## Declaration

```swift
var cookies: [HTTPCookie]? { get }
```

## Discussion

If you want to sort the cookie storage’s cookies, you should use the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/HTTPCookieStorage/sortedCookies(using:)] method instead of sorting the result of this method.

## Retrieving cookies

- **getCookiesFor(_:completionHandler:)**: Fetches cookies relevant to the specified task and passes them to the completion handler.
- **cookies(for:)**: Returns all the cookie storage’s cookies that are sent to a specified URL.
- **sortedCookies(using:)**: Returns all of the cookie storage’s cookies, sorted according to a given set of sort descriptors.
